title: Protect yourself from election disinformation
description: It's almost time to vote. NPR's Miles Parks explains what research can tell us about how to combat fake political news — and why it's so tricky to separate fact from fiction.
copyright: Copyright 2019-2021 NPR - For Personal Use Only
